DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study evaluate efficacy specialize exclusive breastfeeding education support program target obese , pregnant , low-income woman Hartford , CT . Specifically , investigator evaluate impact intervention exclusive partial breastfeeding rate birth , 1 , 3 6 month pp . Secondary aim study : ) characterize postpartum weight loss pattern blood pressure value obese woman , study group ; b ) evaluate potential difference infant morbidity ( diarrhea , otitis medium rehospitalization ) , study group .
DOC.brief_title: Breastfeeding Education Support Trial Obese Women ( BESTOW )
DOC.criteria: obese ( prepregnant BMI 27.0 great ) pregnant woman deliver Hartford Hospital 34 week gestation consider breastfeed child low income ( < 185 % Federal poverty level ) planning remain great Hartford area 6 month postpartum must access telephone followup interview delivery healthy , term , singleton HIV positive condition interfere exclusive breastfeeding Infant admit Neonatal Intensive Care Unit
